description: Deep Neural Network Verification tool and framework for standardized verification

solutions.code: pip install dnnv

pip install dnnv[eran,marabou,neurify,nnenum]
# Or all verifiers:
pip install dnnv[all]

git clone https://github.com/dlshriver/dnnv.git
cd dnnv
pip install -e .[dev]
dnnv path/to/model.onnx path/to/property.py

import torch.onnx
torch.onnx.export(model, dummy_input, 'model.onnx', opset_version=11)

# DNNV supports: Conv, ReLU, Linear, MaxPool, Flatten
# May need to simplify model for some verifiers

errors.cause: Invalid DNNP property or syntax error

solutions.code:
# property.py (DNNP format):
from dnnv.properties import *

N = Network('N')
x = Image('x')
epsilon = Parameter('epsilon', float, default=0.03)

Forall(
    x,
    Implies(
        (0 <= x <= 1),
        And(*[
            N[:-1](x + delta).argmax() == N[:-1](x).argmax()
            for delta in [-epsilon, epsilon]
        ])
    )
)

# Simple robustness property:
Forall(
    x,
    Implies(
        And(x >= x0 - epsilon, x <= x0 + epsilon),
        N(x).argmax() == label
    )
)
dnnv model.onnx property.py --debug

# Install specific verifier:
pip install dnnv[eran]  # or marabou, neurify, etc.
dnnv --help  # Shows installed verifiers

dnnv model.onnx property.py --verifier nnenum
# Options: eran, marabou, neurify, nnenum, reluplex, planet
dnnv model.onnx property.py --verifier eran --set timeout=300

# Verifier speed (generally):
# ERAN (incomplete) > nnenum > Marabou (complete)

# Reduce epsilon or region size
epsilon = Parameter('epsilon', float, default=0.01)  # smaller
dnnv model.onnx property.py --verifier eran
dnnv model.onnx property.py --verifier eran --set batch_size=1

# sat: Property is SATISFIABLE
# Means: There EXISTS an input satisfying the property
# For safety: property usually asks if violation exists
# So sat = violation found = UNSAFE

# unsat: Property is UNSATISFIABLE
# No input satisfies the (negated) property
# For safety: unsat = no violation = SAFE

# unknown: Verification inconclusive
# Try: different verifier, more time, simpler property
dnnv model.onnx property.vnnlib --format vnnlib

# DNNV can convert between formats
dnnv property.py --convert vnnlib --output property.vnnlib

errors.cause: Missing or invalid parameter in property

solutions.code: dnnv model.onnx property.py --set epsilon=0.03 --set label=5

# In property.py:
epsilon = Parameter('epsilon', float, default=0.03)
